34 The amount of 35 mg N per 100 g is considered as the highest acceptable level for the fresh fish by the European Commission. It has been suggested that the amount of 25 mg nitrogen per 100 g would be the beginning of corruption for the rainbow trout fillet.
35 In the present study, the level did not exceed in the treatments containing EO, extract and the combination of them. In our study, the TVB-N for coated treatments was less than acceptable level (35 mg N per 100 g), while it was unacceptable for control and vacuum treatment from day 6.
